input.job_description:
Zubair Ahmed 
Business Development Executive 
A prospective Marketing and Business Analyst, a recipient of Management Sciences from NED University of Engineering & Technology,
who endeavors to pose and respond with a results-oriented business attitude in developing creative marketing collateral for diverse
projects. Establishes clear standards and enforces protocols for consistent, high-quality results by utilizing interpersonal skills, data
analytical skills, excellent time management and problem-solving skills. 
za05760@gmail.com 
03310211624 
R-280, Sheet 51, Block B, Saima Arabian Villas, Karachi. 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Business Development Executive 
Paymob 
2021 - Present
, 
 
Karachi 
Deﬁned and integrated roles, responsibilities and processes for
business team and data management organization. 
Created spreadsheets using Microsoft Excel for daily, weekly and
monthly reporting. 
Developed and executed strategic initiatives to implement key
changes and improvements in business development and sales
programs. 
Used critical thinking to break down problems, evaluate solutions
and make decisions. 
Market Research Analyst 
Precision Engineering Equipment FZE 
2019 - 2021
, 
 
Karachi 
Worked closely with product development teams to create and
maintain marketing materials for sales presentations and client
meetings in the industry. 
Analyzed pre-season marketing plans to generate better sales and
communicate with customers through calling/emailing. 
Developed marketing strategies and resolved problems to drive
sales, through CRM and managed database information of market. 
Utilized diﬀerent tools to analyze marketing and ﬁnancial trends such
as, SQL, Excel, & Power BI and suggested measures to reduce costs
and improve business processes. 
Internship 
Unilever Pakistan 
2019
, 
 
Karachi 
Analyzing and scrutinizing the company's requirements for ongoing
projects and contracts. 
Update and manage internal database for future vendor’s selection
and their terms, this information is helpful for upcoming projects. 
Developed and strengthened supplier relationships. 
EDUCATION 
BS - Management Science 
NED University of Engineering & Technology 
2022
, 
 
Karachi 
SKILLS 
Problem Solving & Business Analytics 
Product Development & Strategist 
CRM 
Business Communication & Reporting 
SQL 
Digital Marketing 
Market Research Analyst 
Data Science Enthusiast 
Leadership skill 
Project & Brand Management 
HubSpot 
Salesforce 
Good Negociation 
Python 
Data Visualization 
Tableau 
Power BI 
PERSONAL PROJECTS 
CPEC 
- 
Final Year Project 
Analyzing the logistic infrastructure development of Pakistan
after CPEC and how it will revamp or rehabilitate the
infrastructure of Pakistan by developing the Special
Economic Zones. We analyze the diﬀerent industrial data in
each province of Pakistan and the impact of SEZs that will
reshape the industry economy in Pakistan 
Midas Safety Pakistan 
- 
Course Project 
Project in Midas Safety Pakistan (Karachi Unit) where I
identiﬁed the process involved in manufacturing their
products i.e., Gloves and Safety Sleeves. I basically analyzed
Midas’s supply chain drivers and examined the use 
of
information technology. 
LANGUAGES 
English 
Full Professional Proﬁciency 
Achievements/Tasks 
Achievements/Tasks 
Achievements/Tasks
input.additional_info: Preferred candidates are from top-tier institutes such as COMSATS University Lahore and Superior University Lahore. Apex Global Solutions supports relocation for the right candidate and offers remote working options. Our hiring process includes a detailed assessment of sales strategies, technical skills through practical scenarios, and behavioral interviews to evaluate cultural fit.
minimum_requirements: 5+ years of experience in business development or sales
Proven ability to develop and implement successful business strategies
Strong understanding of IT and manufacturing industries
Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field
